data.price: 1. Diggah Nanu muxxó íe baray leylatul Qhadri deqsitat kaa (Qhuraan kinnuk) oobisne Ramdaanak.
2. Nabiyow leylatul Qhadri bar kinnim maca koo tiysixxigeeh?
3. Leylatul Qhadri usuk baray muxxó ley, alfi alsak kayrih aysuk raaqa kinni.
data.arabic: لَيۡلَةُ ٱلۡقَدۡرِ خَيۡرٞ مِّنۡ أَلۡفِ شَهۡرٖ

data.price: 4. Tama barat malay kaa kee Jibriiliy ruuc deqsita qaraanak edde obta, sirmi Rabbih idnih, ummaan caagidiy Yalli woo liggidih addat mekle luk.
data.arabic: تَنَزَّلُ ٱلۡمَلَٰٓئِكَةُ وَٱلرُّوحُ فِيهَا بِإِذۡنِ رَبِّهِم مِّن كُلِّ أَمۡرٖ

data.price: 5. Woo bari saayaay nagaaya, maaci maacissi iyyam fanah.
